channel.title: [Source][VB] Highscore
channel.description:
These functions get the Rank, Lvl and XP a skill in the highscore, the names of the skills have to be written like on the highscorepage. These functions were made by Cruel (or Cruel_Machine), I just adjusted them to get the html page themselves (or you could imput the page, thats up to you).
[code]Function GetRank(Username As String, Skill As String, Optional HTML As String) As String Dim pos As Integer, tmpInet As Object If HTML = "" Then Set tmpInet = CreateObject("InetCtls.Inet") HTML = tmpInet.OpenURL("http://hiscore.runescape.com/lang/en/aff/runescape/hiscorepersonal.ws?user1=" & Username) tmpInet.Cancel End If pos = InStr(1, HTML, ">" & Skill & "<", 1) If InStr(pos, HTML, "t""", 1) > pos + 40 Then Exit Function pos = InStr(pos, HTML, "t""", 1) + 3 GetRank = Mid(HTML, pos, InStr(pos, HTML, "<") - pos) End Function
Function GetLvl(Username As String, Skill As String, Optional HTML As String) As String Dim pos As Integer, tmpInet As Object If HTML = "" Then Set tmpInet = CreateObject("InetCtls.Inet") HTML = tmpInet.OpenURL("http://hiscore.runescape.com/lang/en/aff/runescape/hiscorepersonal.ws?user1=" & Username) tmpInet.Cancel End If pos = InStr(1, HTML, ">" & Skill & "<", 1) If InStr(pos, HTML, "t""", 1) > pos + 40 Then Exit Function pos = InStr(InStr(pos, HTML, "t""", 1) + 1, HTML, "t""", 1) + 3 GetLvl = Mid(HTML, pos, InStr(pos, HTML, "<") - pos) End Function
Function GetXP(Username As String, Skill As String, Optional HTML As String) As String Dim pos As Integer, tmpInet As Object If HTML = "" Then Set tmpInet = CreateObject("InetCtls.Inet") HTML = tmpInet.OpenURL("http://hiscore.runescape.com/lang/en/aff/runescape/hiscorepersonal.ws?user1=" & Username) tmpInet.Cancel End If pos = InStr(1, HTML, ">" & Skill & "<", 1) If InStr(pos, HTML, "t""", 1) > pos + 40 Then Exit Function pos = InStr(InStr(InStr(pos, HTML, "t""", 1) + 1, HTML, "t""", 1) + 1, HTML, "t""", 1) + 3 GetXP = Mid(HTML, pos, InStr(pos, HTML, "<") - pos) End Function[/code]

item.title: [Source][VB] Highscore
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

These functions get the Rank, Lvl and XP a skill in the highscore, the names of the skills have to be written like on the highscorepage. These functions were made by Cruel (or Cruel_Machine), I just adjusted them to get the html page themselves (or you could imput the page, thats up to you).

Function GetRank(Username As String, Skill As String, Optional HTML As String) As String
Dim pos As Integer, tmpInet As Object
    If HTML = "" Then
        Set tmpInet = CreateObject("InetCtls.Inet")
        HTML = tmpInet.OpenURL("http://hiscore.runescape.com/lang/en/aff/runescape/hiscorepersonal.ws?user1=" & Username)
        tmpInet.Cancel
    End If
    pos = InStr(1, HTML, ">" & Skill & "<", 1)
    If InStr(pos, HTML, "t""", 1) > pos + 40 Then Exit Function
    pos = InStr(pos, HTML, "t""", 1) + 3
    GetRank = Mid(HTML, pos, InStr(pos, HTML, "<") - pos)
End Function
Function GetLvl(Username As String, Skill As String, Optional HTML As String) As String
Dim pos As Integer, tmpInet As Object
    If HTML = "" Then
        Set tmpInet = CreateObject("InetCtls.Inet")
        HTML = tmpInet.OpenURL("http://hiscore.runescape.com/lang/en/aff/runescape/hiscorepersonal.ws?user1=" & Username)
        tmpInet.Cancel
    End If
    pos = InStr(1, HTML, ">" & Skill & "<", 1)
    If InStr(pos, HTML, "t""", 1) > pos + 40 Then Exit Function
    pos = InStr(InStr(pos, HTML, "t""", 1) + 1, HTML, "t""", 1) + 3
    GetLvl = Mid(HTML, pos, InStr(pos, HTML, "<") - pos)
End Function
Function GetXP(Username As String, Skill As String, Optional HTML As String) As String
Dim pos As Integer, tmpInet As Object
    If HTML = "" Then
        Set tmpInet = CreateObject("InetCtls.Inet")
        HTML = tmpInet.OpenURL("http://hiscore.runescape.com/lang/en/aff/runescape/hiscorepersonal.ws?user1=" & Username)
        tmpInet.Cancel
    End If
    pos = InStr(1, HTML, ">" & Skill & "<", 1)
    If InStr(pos, HTML, "t""", 1) > pos + 40 Then Exit Function
    pos = InStr(InStr(InStr(pos, HTML, "t""", 1) + 1, HTML, "t""", 1) + 1, HTML, "t""", 1) + 3
    GetXP = Mid(HTML, pos, InStr(pos, HTML, "<") - pos)
End Function
